home.intro: I build modern web applications with a focus on user experience and performance.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm a fullstack web developer with expertise in React, Next.js, and Node.js. I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
about.bio2: With over 5 years of experience in the industry, I've worked on a variety of projects from small business websites to large-scale enterprise applications.
